      • setNodeToAttributes

        public Dot.Builder<T> setNodeToAttributes(Function<T,com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedMap<String,String>> func)
        Configures a function to be used to extract additional attributes to include when rendering graph nodes.

        In order ot prevent collisions, all attribute names are prefixed with buck_. They are also escaped in order to be compatible with the Dot format.

      • build

        public Dot<T> build()
